item.title: ロン・デサンティスはインタビューで、「ゲイと言うな」法案をめぐる確執でディズニーを黙らせることに勝利したと主張し、同社は「一瞥もしなかった」と述べた（Armando Tinoco/Deadline）。
item.description:
Armando Tinoco / Deadline:
In an interview, Ron DeSantis claims victory over silencing Disney in their feud over the “Don't Say Gay” bill, saying the company has “not made a peep”  —  Ron DeSantis is claiming victory over silencing Disney following their public feud after the entertainment company openly opposed …

item.title: 英国の専門誌出版社ヘイマーケットは、自動車メーカーの広告費減少に伴い、自動車部門のスタッフ120人のうち最大14人を解雇する計画だ（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
UK specialist magazine publisher Haymarket plans to lay off up to 14 of 120 staffers in its automotive division as it suffers a drop in ad spend by car makers  —  The teams behind What Car? and Autocar are restructuring to cope with turbulence in the industry.

item.title: Fox NewsはDominionへの書簡で、投票技術会社に対し、流出したTucker Carlsonのテキストメッセージの発信元ではないことを「調査・確認」するよう求めている（Dominick Mastrangelo/The Hill）。
item.description:
Dominick Mastrangelo / The Hill:
In a letter to Dominion, Fox News asks the voting tech company to “investigate and confirm” that it is not the source of leaked Tucker Carlson text messages  —  Lawyers for Fox News are asking officials at Dominion Voting Systems to conduct an internal investigation after media reports …

item.title: NPRの主要番組の司会者で有色人種の女性であるレイラ・ファデル、ミシェル・マーティン、アイーシャ・ラスコー、フアナ・サマーズが、多様化に向けた同局の取り組みについて語る（Jennifer Gerson/The 19th)
item.description:
Jennifer Gerson / The 19th:
Leila Fadel, Michel Martin, Ayesha Rascoe, and Juana Summers, the hosts of flagship NPR programs and women of color, discuss the outlet's efforts to diversify  —  Show your support for news that represents you.  Donate today.  —  Juana Summers is struck by “an incredible sense of responsibility.”

item.title: YouTubeでは、Slateのポッドキャストは先週平均75回/ビデオ、NPRは平均179回/ビデオで、スタジオの映像が再生回数を押し上げている（Ashley Carman/Bloomberg)
item.description:
Ashley Carman / Bloomberg:
Despite big reach elsewhere, on YouTube, Slate podcasts averaged ~75 views/video last week while NPR averaged ~179/video; studio footage drives views higher  —  Hello and welcome back to Soundbite.  Today we'll look at how podcast networks are faring on YouTube and have an update on Sony Music Entertainment's podcast efforts.

item.title: AIテキストジェネレーターが静かにインターネットの多くをオーサリングしている。AIが生成した書籍やパーソナライズされた記事が増えることは、人間が書いたコンテンツを買うクライアントが減ることを意味する（Will Oremus/Washington Post）
item.description:
Will Oremus / Washington Post:
AI text generators are quietly authoring more of the internet; more AI-generated books and personalized articles mean fewer clients buying human-written content  —  From recipes to product reviews to how-to books, artificial intelligence text generators are quietly authoring more and more of the internet.

item.title: イングランド・フットボールリーグの各クラブは、スカイスポーツとの5年契約で、放送試合数を1シーズンあたり1,000試合以上に引き上げることを承認することを決議（The Guardian）
item.description:
The Guardian:
English Football League clubs vote to accept a £935M, five-year deal with Sky Sports, which raises the number of matches broadcast to 1,000+ per season  —  - Five-year agreement begins in 2024 - Deal keeps Saturday blackout in place  —  English Football League clubs have unanimously voted …

item.title: Nielsen：YouTubeはどのネットワークやストリーマーよりもテレビ視聴を占める、情報源：米国のYouTube視聴の45％近くはテレビで、アップフロント広告の売上は$7B+に達する可能性（Sahil Patel/The Information）
item.description:
Sahil Patel / The Information:
Nielsen: YouTube makes up more TV viewing than any network or streamer; sources: nearly 45% of US YouTube viewing is on TV and upfront ad sales could hit $7B+  —  For years, Google's YouTube couldn't get any respect from the TV industry.  TV marketers wouldn't go near it out of fear …

item.title: 2007年の脚本家ストライキがリアリティTVの台頭を引き起こしたという考え方と、台本なしの番組で働く労働者やキャストが慢性的に過小評価されていることを紹介（Alex Sujong Laughlin/Defector)
item.description:
Alex Sujong Laughlin / Defector:
A look at the idea that the 2007 writers' strike caused the rise of reality TV and how workers on unscripted shows and cast members are chronically undervalued  —  As of Tuesday, the Writers Guild of America is on strike.  Their proposals are aimed at making the work of writing TV …

item.title: 2012年に開設されたBuzzFeed Newsがウェブサイトを閉鎖しアーカイブ化、現・元スタッフが最後の投稿として思い出を振り返る（BuzzFeed News）
item.description:
BuzzFeed News:
BuzzFeed News, launched in 2012, shuts down and archives its website; current and former staff share their memories in a recap as the outlet's final post  —  BuzzFeed News has been described as a chaos agent, a pirate ship, a reputable news organization, and, most notably, a “failing pile of garbage” by former president Donald Trump.

item.title: 情報源Vice Mediaは、Fortress Investment GroupとSoros Fund Managementを含む貸し手によって破産から4億ドルで買収される契約が近づいている（Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Sources: Vice Media is nearing a deal to get acquired out of bankruptcy by lenders including Fortress Investment Group and Soros Fund Management for ~$400M  —  The media business is in talks to sell itself to top lenders Fortress Investment and Soros Fund Management through a reorganization that would wipe out other investors

item.title: CBSが所有するCWの8局は、2023年9月に独立し、パラマウントのコンテンツを扱い、ScrippsやGray TVのようなスポーツ契約を目指す予定（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
Eight CW stations owned by CBS plan to go independent in September 2023, carry Paramount content, and pursue sports deals akin to Scripps' and Gray TV's  —  CW stations in Philadelphia, Seattle, Atlanta, Detroit and other major markets will drop their affiliation and go independent.

item.title: Scrippsは、WNBAの試合を放送する契約を結んだ2週間後に、RSNをバイパスするもう一つのチームであるNHLのVegas Golden Knightsの試合を放送する複数年契約を締結しました（John Ourand/Sports Business Journal）。
item.description:
John Ourand / Sports Business Journal:
Scripps signs a multiyear deal to carry the games of the NHL's Vegas Golden Knights, another team bypassing RSNs, two weeks after signing to carry WNBA games  —  For the second time in a week, a local broadcast channel picked up the rights to a professional sports team.

item.title: Fox News、Tucker Carlsonのリーク映像を取り上げた一連の記事をめぐり、素材が自社のIPであると主張し、Media Mattersに停止命令書を送付（Colby Hall/Mediaite)
item.description:
Colby Hall / Mediaite:
Fox News sends Media Matters a cease-and-desist letter over a series of stories featuring leaked footage of Tucker Carlson, claiming the material is its IP  —  Fox News has sent a cease and desist letter to Media Matters and its president and CEO Angelo Carusone over a series of stories posted …

item.title: フォックス、アトランタ、DC、デトロイトのローカルニュース、天気、番組を紹介する無料ストリーミングアプリ「Fox Local」を開始、後にさらに14カ所に展開予定（Matthew Keys/The Desk）
item.description:
Matthew Keys / The Desk:
Fox launches Fox Local, a free streaming app featuring local news, weather, and programming in Atlanta, DC, and Detroit, with plans to roll out to 14 more later  —  The Fox Local app offers live access to news feeds from three Fox-owned stations; the other 14 will be added at a later date.
